entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TensorPrimitive: Consider to optimize integer divisions #105204
  • [Android] Android x86 emulator failures in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource runtime metrics #105203
    9.0.0
  • [apple] Mobile failures in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` runtime metrics #105202
    9.0.0
  • `JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Bytemark/Bytemark` failed with `Assert failure: al->alloc_list_tail() == 0` #105201
  • [NativeAOT] Exact devirtualization produces a redundant type test with empty fallback #105199
  • Configuration binding ignores TypeConverter when binding against a IConfigurationSection #105195
    Future
  • JIT: Missing support for pre-indexed addressing on arm64 #105193
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Missing support for post-indexed addressing modes in `stp` and `ldp` #105192
    10.0.0

Closed

  • MetricEventSource value published events don't unambiguously resolve which Meter and Instrument tags they are refering to #93767
    9.0.0
  • MetricEventSource value published events don't resolve which scope they are refering to #93097
    9.0.0
  • Introducing Environment.ProcessorUserTime & ProcessorPrivilegedTime #104844
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] Various regex tests time out under jitstress #100754
    9.0.0
  • Add to constructor of the `BrotliStream` class ability to specify quality #1556
    9.0.0
  • Redundant null check in JIT #105191
  • Metrics "framework" for JIT #10462
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete dead Interop.Gdi32.* code #105209
    needs-area-label
  • Copy byte array as block in `Guid` ctor #105208
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Replace `Debug.Assert(false,` with `Debug.Fail(` #105205
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] For transition profiler callbacks, always load the thread #105200
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Change VN's representation for phi definitions #105198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Introduce VNWalkPhis and use in VNNeverNegative as an example #105197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Emit More EventSource Data For Metrics Measurements #104993
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Introducing Environment.CpuUsage #105152
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove now-redundant Debug.Assert messages #105167
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Fix infinite loop in copy prop GT_COMMA update logic #105196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix method numbering in Memory-model.md example code #105168
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable ExposedLocalsNumbering #105194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add an emitter peephole for post-indexed addressing #105181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete dead code related to intercept stubs #105127
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono] Issue #103365 follow-up PR #105006
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Some more automated C# modernization in corelib #105151
    area-Meta
  • Remove unnecessary `IDE0060` suppressions #105036
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Have lowering set up IR for post-indexed addressing and make strength reduced IV updates amenable to post-indexed addressing #105185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2499442 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #105150
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
